mapper.insert: insert into root(studentid, username, password, department, college, region) values(#{studentid}, #{username}, #{password}, #{department}, #{college}, #{region})
mapper.select: select * from root where studentid=#{studentid} and password=#{password}

select * from root
and username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
and studentid like concat('%', #{studentid}, '%')
and department like concat('%', #{department}, '%')
